name: walt-starter
description: Walt(an alternative syntax for WebAssembly text format) project Starter

scripts.server:dev: npx concurrently "npm run build:dev" "npx webpack-dev-server --env.development --config webpack.config.js"
scripts.server:prod: npx concurrently "npm run build:prod" "npx webpack-dev-server --env.production --config webpack.config.js"
